title: No one remembers a brand without a story
description:
Brand storytelling is one of the most powerful marketing tools, serving as a bridge between a business and its consumers. A well-crafted narrative can make even the most unsexy companies seem compelling. On this episode, we’re talking to Kerstin Emhoff, the CEO of award-winning production companies PRETTYBIRD and Ventureland. You may recognize their viral commercials for Uber and Facebook, among others. 
Today, she’s telling us about the impact of strong storytelling, how to craft an authentic brand narrative, and what makes commercials go viral. She’ll also be telling us about her efforts to support underrepresented talent in the entertainment industry.
